contentList.content: Liberated by the unknown powers of the Sunstone, a lake of pure silver atop a dormant volcano with fumes that provide good fortune to those pure of heart; Sunstone Gnomes are a group of Deep Gnomes living in Peace, Love, and Unity in the desert of Maztica.
As you breathe in the Silver Mist; experience its hallucinogenic effects.
Your frequent exposure to the mystical fumes of the Sunstone lake has given you an immunity from being unconscious and intoxicated by silver fumes.
The many visions and blessings you have received has altered your blood and opened your mind, strengthening it. You have Resistance against Psychic damage.
Become dipped in the morning sun's golden ecstasy as your skin turns to gold and you become slowly resistant to all incoming physical weapon damage.
You summon a layer of reflective volcanic glass to keep you from harm.
Exposure to the Sunstone has turned this creature blood silver.
Summon the mystical mist of the Sunstone. Targets inside become Intoxicated.
Envelop the ground in a cloud of silver fumes. These fumes cause those without a tolerance for them to become Intoxicated.

The intoxicating silver fumes fill you with uncontrollable ecstacy causing you to shuffle and dance.

Attack Rolls against it have Advantage, while its Attack Rolls and Intelligence and Wisdom Saving Throws have Disadvantage.
